subject: Baseball
Steroids
lead_paragraph: The Yankees have a new manager in Joe Girardi, several new coaches and a new leading voice in Hank Steinbrenner, but as usual, they still want to win it all.
snippet: The Yankees have a new manager in Joe Girardi, several new coaches and a new leading voice in Hank Steinbrenner, but as usual, they still want to win it all.
